item.title: Yes, but what are Gaussian Processes?
item.description: Part I of a conceptual introduction to Gaussian processes, focusing on understanding GPs as stochastic processes.

item.description: EDA on electricity plants in Pennsylvania using the tidyverse and the eia package.
